QuestData.Title: Putting the Pieces Together
QuestData.Description: $R. If you act in the service of the Stone Lords, there are those that might aid you.$B$BWatch for the Stonebound. They lie dormant all around the Shuddering Spires. It should not take much prompting to rebind them to service against the flayers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Aid 6 Dormant Stonebound Elementals in reforming.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Berracite grumbles, and you feel the reverberations gradually roll by under your feet.>
